Articles.Content: So, who here plays this game?
I don't play it myself, but I have a close friend who does. He's recommending me to try it, so I'd do so.. soon.
yep i do and so far loving it. My favorite ship would have to be either my isokaze or kuma, so far
I have played it, but it was on a friend's computer during the closed beta phase. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Not yet. Going to install it at some point. Have played WoT and WoWP tons though.

> 
> yep i do and so far loving it. My favorite ship would have to be either my isokaze or kuma, so far

Nice! So far, of the ones i have so far, the chester is my favorite

Off-topic, but does War Thunder count?

Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Okay, maybe not..
Would anyone like if I posted my World of Warships Replays on this?
Cood idea, but promise to share your best one and not the relax one ; ) definetely need to see you play at your best and not in two fingers relax mode ; )
define "relax mode"... and...I just started playing, so most are pretty relaxed anyway, though, the first replay I made (using the Chester) had me pitted against a South Carolina Battleship!
Well, if I start playing this, I'm definitely using destroyers. I remember them being a lot of fun. *Eat torpedo!*

> 
> Well, if I start playing this, I'm definitely using destroyers. I remember them being a lot of fun. *Eat torpedo!*

As Baron Von Gamerz would say, "Give 'em Torpedus!"

- - - Updated - - -

I'm actually going up the American Battleship line! I want them big 16 in guns!

Ok, here's my most recent Chester Replay. Note, you will need to use World of Warships to make this work...if someone could record this for me and send me the recording, it would be most appreciated so I can post it on youtube and then the link here!

[http://www./download/uttw39cjbxwtsh3/20150727_161108_PASC002-Chester-1908_34_OC_islands.wowsreplay](http://www./download/uttw39cjbxwtsh3/20150727_161108_PASC002-Chester-1908_34_OC_islands.wowsreplay)

- - - Updated - - -

nevermind, I got the recording software to work...finally...
Need to,rerecord the replay, dad started talking to me while,the mike was on.
Ok, got a couple of epic matches that now need to be recorded from the replays!
And, just got a battleship!

Thanks to the post here about it (not in this thread0 ....yes.... I started playing it AND stopped playing KSP.... 

Treason? no.... taking a break.

I'm hooked, I have a battleship and saving up the hard way for a better ship.

I'm playing on the EU server.... keep an eye out for my name... its the same in WoWS as it is here... ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Thanks to the post here about it (not in this thread0 ....yes.... I started playing it AND stopped playing KSP....

Eu? Rats, i'm on the north american server.

A note for fellow WoWS players: A gift ship is currently available for the 17th Anniversary of Wargaming. If you enter the code "ALBANY" (without the quotation marks of course) in the bonus code section of the premium shop, you will get the premium ship Albany (CL-23, to clarify which Albany it is) and a port slot for it.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-01T01:05:05Z" title="08/01/2015 01:05  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 1, 2015</time> by mike9606**

Hey, mind if I ask what battleship you have?

I love this game!

I'm on the BB Wyoming and the CL Phoenix at the moment. Can't wait to get to tier 5 with the BB New York and the CL Omaha. Barely played any IJN ships yet, waiting for a friend to get his PC fixed up for that.

In game name is Rainbowlicious.

> 
> I love this game!
> I'm on the BB Wyoming and the CL Phoenix at the moment. Can't wait to get to tier 5 with the BB New York and the CL Omaha. Barely played any IJN ships yet, waiting for a friend to get his PC fixed up for that.

Nice, my username on there is Toa\_Sampa (surprise) my baddest (meaning awesome) ship,is the S Carolina. I also am,wanting to work on the japanese bb line, but, only at the tier 2 chikuma.

Oh it is finally out!? Yay!!

\*goes to download\*
